name: On The Path - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
There are 17 audio tracks and small musical sketches, taken directly from the game and some of them aren't included into the gameplay.

Hybrid_Line - Foretaste Of Deliverance
Hybrid_Line - Fading
Hybrid_Line - Seven Days Before
Hybrid_Line - To Fly Alone
Hybrid_Line - Roads Go On and Roads Crosses - Blue
Hybrid_Line - Roads Go On and Roads Crosses - Green
Hybrid_Line - Roads Go On and Roads Crosses - Violet
Hybrid_Line - Roads Go On and Roads Crosses - Memories
METALIFE - Battle Gothic
METALIFE - Ghost Road - Insane In The Forest Step One
METALIFE - Ghost Road - Insane In The Forest Step Two
METALIFE - Ghost Road - Insane In The Forest Step Three
METALIFE and Hybrid Line - Heaven In The Clouds
METALIFE and Hybrid Line - Slow Flow
METALIFE and Hybrid Line - Deliverance

BONUS -

1 - st Track from our New game
2 - nd Track from our New Game

You can find DLC file in the following Path :

C:\Program Files \Steam\steamapps\common\On The Path\DLC_Music

short_description: There are 14 audio tracks and small musical sketches, taken directly from the game and some of them aren't included into the gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
